channel.title: peer pressure on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in peer pressure on Barefoot Rob

item.title: students leveled up real quick
item.description: 17:47 Wednesday 06 December 2017 JST At my third of three kids classes here at JB, we had a new student, 4 or 5 years older than the others. The two previously-oldest girls in the class suddenly stopped messing around and tried significantly harder than usual. Such a nice change of pace! I used a technique I learned from Tariq: keep having them switch conversation partners and repeat the same conversation with a new partner.
